Items.Title: Oversight - Examining the New York City Civilian Complaint Review Board’s Case Processing Times, Outreach Efforts, and New Procedures.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Examining the New York City Civilian Complaint Review Board’s Case Processing Times, Outreach Efforts, and New Procedures.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the police department to publicly post reports concerning cardiopulmonary resuscitation and automated external defibrillator training.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the NYPD to publicly post reports concerning cardiopulmonary resuscitation and automated external defibrillator training.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, Briana’s Law, requiring all police officers to be retrained in cardiopulmonary resuscitation every two years.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
